In this session of **MA1034Eng** the objectives are:

* Introduce the concept of linear combinations. <br/><br/>
* Differentiate between linear dependence and independence. <br/><br/>
* Introduce the concept of generated spaces. <br/><br/>
* Define the concept of dimension. <br/><br/>
